TestPattern.Name: XSS MultiStep
TestPattern.Description: This pattern could be used on any web applications that use user inputs not filtered; a stored XSS is usually used to redirect a user to a malevolent site in order to steal browser information (session, cookies, and exploitation) and it will be trigger all the time because itâ€™s a persistent attack.
TestPattern.TestObjective: Steal cookie session of user, gain browser privileges
TestPattern.Observation: Execution of JavaScript payload (interactive) + information stolen is a success
TestPattern.KnownUses: Sometimes web application use web application firewall to mitigate attacks but still, it could be possible to bypass it using variants
